metadata.title: FTL (Full-Truckload) Coordinator Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for FTL (Full-Truckload) Coordinator positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with experience in managing full-truckload shipments and logistics planning. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Senior FTL Coordinator
achievements: Streamlined logistics processes, reducing transportation costs by 15% over two years.
Led a team of 5 logistics specialists to successfully manage over 200 monthly full-truckload shipments.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve delivery accuracy by 20%.

experience.title: FTL Coordinator
achievements: Managed logistics planning for 150+ FTL shipments per month, ensuring timely delivery and cost efficiency.
Implemented a new tracking system, improving shipment visibility and customer satisfaction rates by 25%.
Negotiated contracts with carriers to achieve an average freight cost reduction of 10%.

experience.title: Junior Logistics Coordinator
achievements: Assisted in coordinating daily full-truckload operations, achieving an on-time delivery rate of 95%.
Developed strong relationships with carriers, boosting cooperation and service level compliance.
Conducted data analysis to support senior colleagues in identifying opportunities for logistics optimization.

projects.name: Logistics Optimization Project
projects.description: Led a comprehensive project to identify and implement optimization strategies across multiple logistics channels, resulting in a 30% increase in operational efficiency.
